To enhance the engagement of its people, the organization should consider activities such as: a) developing a process to share knowledge; b) making use of its people’s competence; c) establishing a skills qualification system and career planning to promote personal development; d) continually reviewing their level of satisfaction, relevant needs and expectations; e) providing opportunities for mentoring and coaching; f) promoting team improvement activities. 9.2.3 Empowerment and motivation of people Empowered and motivated people at all levels throughout the organization are essential to enhance the organization’s ability to create and deliver value.
